item.title: endpoints
item.description: Metadata 2022-06-15 04:10 | endpoints | Doriel Rivalet Content require coro-http and json create function according to the doc’s endpoint type (GET, POST, PATCH, etc) (optional) send token/cookie as the function arg if required coroutine.
